attributes.action: Force all manufacturers to declare the prescence of palm oil in their list of ingredients, and not to hide it in a blanket declaration of vegetable oil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rain forest in Borneo is being systematically destroyed to plant palm oil plantations. This is resulting in vast areas of devastation, and the probable extinction of the Orangutan, as highlighted in the Panorama program on 22nd February 2010.
Please sign the petition to force manufactuers of food products to declare the prescence of palm oil on their labels, so that we have the choice to boycott their products. And hopefully prevent the extinction of these beautiful animals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
